message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm afraid $22,000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?  This is a fair offer considering its potential.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product.
